title: just a question bout punishments (chat restrictions, bans etc)
body:
So is there a cooldown on bans or chat restrictions?

Example: Lets say i get 14 day ban does that stay forever or does it cooldown slowly.

replies.body:
If you demonstrate good or neutral behaviour after your punishment you will eventually drop a punishment tier. Obviously good behaviour will drop you faster than neutral behaviour, but there is no set time. 

The average player will take about 3 months to drop back into good standing, but receiving a 14 day ban would increase that time quite significantly.
Thanks for the reply much appreciated.
